title: PMS 2.0 723 - Ian Rapoport, Darius Butler, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ Hawk, and the boys chat about Tom Brady returning to practice in Tampa Bay, David Bakhtiari officially returning to practice for the Green Bay Packers, the news from Dana White over the weekend that Tom Brady and Gronk were almost members of the Raiders before Jon Gruden vetoed it, and everything else happening around the NFL as we approach the final week of the preseason. Joining the show to chat about Lamar Jackson's contract situation, if he has any more clarity on the Tom Brady situation, if Kareem Hunt is going to get traded, and everything else happening around the NFL is NFL Network Insider and friend of the progrum, Ian Rapoport (18:04-46:32). Later, 9 year NFL veteran at Defensive Back, host of The Man-To-Man podcast, Everything DB, Darius Butler joins the show to break down some film including the discussion surrounding Kayvon Thibodeaux getting hurt on a cut block in a game against the Bengals and whether or not it was a dirty play, and highlight some DB play from the Browns Eagles game that saw Devon Allen catch a masterful deep ball touchdown (1:28:40-1:52:52). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow to watch the show, and listen on Sirius XM Channel 82, Mad Dog Radio. We appreciate the hell out of all you. See you tomorrow, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
